snippet.title: MMORPG Tycoon 2 Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
We've been greenlit!  Visit our page on Steam at:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=527174166

Are you ready to be an MMORPG Tycoon... again?

MMORPG Tycoon 2 is a single-player world-builder game about creating the greatest MMORPG of all time – yours.
